title: Mediterranean beef casserole
ingredients: ['300g baby onions', '1 tbsp olive oil', '500g lean stewing beef, diced', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '½ tsp ground cumin', '½ tsp ground cinnamon', '400g tin chopped tomatoes', '400ml red wine', '1 bay leaf', '350g baby new potatoes', '400g tin artichoke hearts, drained and halved', '200g frozen broad beans, thawed', '50g Kalamata olives, stoned and roughly chopped']
